headline: Mon Power and Potomac Edison Select Maidsville, West Virginia, Site for New Natural Gas Power Plant
summary: Mon Power and Potomac Edison, subsidiaries of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), have selected a 35-acre site next to the companies' Fort Martin Power Station in Maidsville, W. Va., as the home of a new 1,200-megawatt natural gas power plant that will help keep electricity reliable and affordable for West Virginia families and businesses for years to come.

raw.headline: Mon Power and Potomac Edison Select Maidsville, West Virginia, Site for New Natural Gas Power Plant
raw.summary: Mon Power and Potomac Edison, subsidiaries of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), have selected a 35-acre site next to the companies' Fort Martin Power Station in Maidsville, W. headline: Eversource Energy Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: ES Q4 EPS tops estimates as revenues climb 13% y/y, operating income more than doubles, and the company guides 2026 EPS of $4.80-$4.95.

raw.headline: Eversource Energy Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
raw.summary: ES Q4 EPS tops estimates as revenues climb 13% y/y, operating income more than doubles, and the company guides 2026 EPS of $4.80-$4.95.
